result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Referral to Dane County Pretrial Services (DCPS)

CASH BAIL PREVIOUSLY POSTED OF $750 TO BE APPLIED TO THIS BOND. 
Cash bond is set in the amount of $1,000 (per case). If the defendant posts cash bail, the defendant must report to and comply with Pretrial Services. The defendant shall report to Pretrial Services by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail. 
The following checked category(s) are also ordered: __ GPS, _x_ Remote Breath (Alcohol) Monitoring, and/or __ Random Drug Testing. 
NONCOMPLIANCE WILL BE REPORTED BY DCPS TO THE JUDICIARY WHO SHALL RESPOND IN ONE OF THESE WAYS: Schedule bail hearing, Increase Supervision, Issue warrant, No change but monitor. 
- Defendant shall not consume alcohol. 
- Defendant shall not be at Tully's II on Monona Dr. 
Trial Judge - Br 17

Court reporter Rowan Thompson.Defendant Brittany K Pearson in court.  Attorney Charles Andrew Ver Hoeve in court for Brittany K Pearson.  Attorney Colleen Lennon in court for State of Wisconsin. Rob Csencsics from DCPS is also present in court. In court today for a bail/bond hearing on cases 22CF915, 22CF1248, and 22CF1435, due to DCPS violations. State gives argument and request an increase in cash bail of $500.00 per case. Mr. Csencsics gives statement. Atty Ver Hoeve gives argument. Ms. Pearson gives statement. Court makes findings and the court orders as follows: 

22CF915- Increase cash bail by $500.00 for a total of $1,300.00. $800.00 previously posted cash bail is to be applied to this bail. All other bail conditions will remain the same. 

22CF1248- Increase cash bail by $500.00 for a total of $750.00. $250.00 previously posted cash bail is to be applied to this bail. All other bail conditions will remain the same. 

22CF1435-Increase cash bail by $500.00 for a total of $750.00. $250.00 previously posted cash bail is to be applied to this bail. All other bail conditions will remain the same.
